imdb.plot outline: Mayhem Music TV is the newest variety show to hit TV! In response to a lack of media outlets for musicians and record labels to get exposure producers of the show decided to offer the chance to be heard and seen on television. Submit your music videos or animated shorts and get the exposure you need! Mayhem Music Television is the first platform for unsigned bands/artists/musicians to be seen with well known Musicians, and top 40 artists on television! In addition you'll laugh your head off when you watch some of the hilarious sketch comedy's featured on the show.
imdb.title: Mayhem Music TV
